description:
Season: 23
Original Air Date: 1/04/2010

Brooke confronts Whip about why he and Sandy are hiding that they are related and why they are both suddenly involved with Bridget’s life.  Sandy learns more discouraging information about her case.   She is besieged with fear, sadness and anger when she revisits the evidence in her case.  Bridget asks Stephanie if she will accept an important position within her and Nick’s family.
